title: Portal surfaces emphasize per-task quality blockers
scope: Improve the internal portal intent detail view to surface per-task quality audit blockers prominently.
Add links to per-task audit JSON files for faster triage.
Do not change audit semantics; UI only.
acceptance: Intent detail view highlights failing tasks and lists their gate.blockers.
UI shows a direct link/path for each per-task quality audit JSON file.
No changes to generated markdown rules; portal remains read-model-driven.

deliverables.title: Portal UI highlights blockers and links per-task audits
acceptance: Failing tasks and blockers are visible without scrolling through raw JSON.
evidence: Portal shows per-task blocker lists after generating and refreshing.

subtasks.title: Render per-task gate.blockers inline and link to audit JSON paths.
done_when: Per-task blockers are visible and each audit JSON path is displayed/clickable.
